item.title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion release date confirmed for December
item.content:encoded:
Dotemu has confirmed that the action beat em up Marvel Cosmic Invasion will be launching on December 1st, and two new characters have been confirmed. Those two new characters are the Invincible Iron Man and Jean Grey as well as her alter ego Phoenix. You can check out both charactes in action in the new release date trailer below.

Marvel Cosmic Invasion will feature a roster of 15 Marvel characters including Captain America, Wolverine, Spider-Man, Storm, Phyla-Vell, Venom, Nova, She-Hulk, Rocket Raccoon, Silver Surfer, Beta Ray Bill, Black Panther, and Cosmic Ghost Rider. While playing you can select two of the characters and take advantage of the tag system to switch between them in the levels, which will also throw up some unique combo moves too. The level locations span from New York City to the Negative Zone as the heroes take on the Annihilation Wave. Players can go through the game solo or play in co-op with others using the drop in/drop out multiplayer mode.

If you are playing on PC, these are the specs you will need.

MINIMUM:

    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6550 or Athlon 64 X2 6400+
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 320, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 6570, 1 GB or Intel HD Graphics
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1080p @ 30 FPS

RECOMMENDED:

    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 or AMD Phenom II X2 550
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730, 2 GB or AMD Radeon R7 240, 2 GB or Intel HD Graphics
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1080p @ 60 FPS

Marvel Cosmic Invasion will be available for PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox Series XS, Xbox One, Switch, and Switch 2.

Source: Steam



https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/10/22/marvel-cosmic-invasion-release-date-confirmed-for-december/

item.title: No Man’s Sky Breach Expedition is live now
item.content:encoded:
Hello Games has announced and launched a new update for No Man’s Sky, calling it Breach. The Breach Expedition is a limited time event that will run for three weeks, taking players to an abandoned universe filled with corvette wrecks that can be salvaged for parts. The end goal of the expedition is to find the Fireship Arcadia, but to get there players will need to venture into hostile environments including the purple star systems.

The purple star solar systems were first teased in the Worlds Part II update, and players venturing to these areas will need to be fully prepared as these are pretty hostile areas environmentally. The prizes of stripping the Corvette wrecks may be worth it though. Equipped with your multi-tool laser you will able to take parts from the wrecks and use them to build ships at a Corvette Workshop. The items you can get as scrap include landing gear, shields, weapons, connectors, and wedge-shaped modules. The rewards going into the Breach include Event Horizon, Eternal Serpents, and Siren of the Stars posters, Aeron Cowling and Aeron Diffuser hull plates, the Atlas-themed Wings of Aeron wing module, the Aeron Drive & Aeron Blade,  the decorative Aeron Winglet, Aeron Pillar & Aeron Pyramid, the Aeron Starship exhaust trail and the Aeron Powershield which can boosts your ship’s defences.

Fixes have also been released since the launch of Voyagers, with Hello Games improving snapping, making collisions more robust, and adding the option to apply a colour palette to a Corvette at the workshop.

Source: Hello Games



https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/10/22/no-mans-sky-breach-expedition-is-live-now/
